# Upbit API Documentation

> 36 documentation files | ~47k tokens

## General Documentation

- [Authentication](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/authentication.md): Please refer to the API documentation for authentication details.
- [Change Log](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/change_log.md): Dear Traders,
- [Error Codes](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/error_codes.md): Please refer to the API documentation for error code details.
- [Network Connectivity](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/network_connectivity.md): Base URL: https://api.upbit.com
- [Rate Limits](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/rate_limits.md): Please refer to the API documentation for rate limiting details.
- [Response Formats](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/response_formats.md): Please refer to the API documentation for response format details.

## Public Endpoints

- [Days Candles](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/days_candles.md)
- [Listing Market List](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/listing_market_list.md)
- [Months Candles](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/months_candles.md)
- [Order Book List](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/order_book_list.md)
- [Order Book Policy](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/order_book_policy.md)
- [Recent Trades History](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/recent_trades_history.md)
- [Seconds Candles](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/seconds_candles.md)
- [Tickers By Quote Currencies](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/tickers_by_quote_currencies.md)
- [Tickers By Trading Pair](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/tickers_by_trading_pair.md)
- [Wallet Status](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/wallet_status.md)
- [Weeks Candles](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/weeks_candles.md)
- [Years Candles](https://rosssaunders.github.io/coincise/raw/upbit/endpoints/public/years_candles.md)
